definitions.definition: A person who does not believe in deities or gods .

subdefinitions.definition: A person who is certain that no deities exist or who thinks that the existence of deities can be disproven .
A person who doubts the existence of deities ( therefore, an agnostic may be considered an atheist ).
Any person lacking belief in deities (including children who are unaware of religion ).

definitions.definition: A person who does not believe in a particular deity (but may believe in another deity).
A person who does not believe in any religion (not even a religion without gods); a nonreligious person. ( Can we verify this sense?)

main_definition: ( religion ) A person who does not believe in deities or gods .
secondary_definitions: ( uncommon ) A person who does not believe in a particular deity (but may believe in another deity).
( sometimes proscribed ) A person who does not believe in any religion (not even a religion without gods); a nonreligious person. ( Can we verify this sense?)
